test-case.name: op-hexBinary-equal2args-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound) $value2 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound).

test-case.name: hexBinary-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "and" operator. Uses the "eq" operator.

test-case.name: hexBinary-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "or" operator. Uses the "eq" operator.

test-case.name: hexBinary-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operation as argument to an "fn:not" function. Uses "eq" operator.

test-case.name: hexBinary-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "and" operator. Uses the "eq" operator and "fn:true()".

test-case.name: hexBinary-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "and" operator. Uses the "eq" operator and "fn:false()".

test-case.name: hexBinary-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "or" operator. Uses the "eq" operator and "fn:true" function.

test-case.name: hexBinary-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "or" operator. Uses the "eq" operator and "fn:false" function.

test-case.name: hexBinary-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "and" operator. Uses the "ne" operator.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "or" operator. Uses the "ne" operator.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operation as argument to an "fn:not" function. Uses "ne" operator.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "op:hexBinary-equal" operator in conjunction with a logical expression, "and" operator. Uses the "ne" operator and "fn:true()".
